data.oai_dc:dc: Alignment of partial sequences of the CHD gene located in the Z-chromosome of Gyps fulvus, Milvus migrans and Neophron percnopterus

DNA sequences of the CHD-Z fragments of Gyps fulvus, Milvus migrans and Neophron percnopterus used for design of LAMP primers suitable for sex determination. These sequences were obtained after Sanger sequencing of the CHD-Z fragments obtained by PCR using 2550F and 2718R primers (Fridolfsson & Ellegren 1999)
